授業目的: To equip students with the skills required to produce grammatically correct and well-organized written work in English. To improve self-expression.
到達目標: To equip students with the skills required to produce grammatically correct and well-organized written work in English. To improve self-expression.
授業方法:
The course will be start by being taught online, and the students will be notified by email and on the message board how to access the lesson materials. Please be sure to check there for information regarding the class.

Lecture, workshop

トピック.授業計画1:
4/16 : The course will be start by being taught online, and the students will be notified by email and on the message board how to access the lesson materials. Please be sure to check there for information regarding the class.


Week 1. Introduction and outline of course. Self-introduction.
Weeks 2 & 3. Writing about someone you admire.
Week 4. Peer editing and submission of work
Weeks 5 & 6. Narration, recalling an event.
Week 7. Peer editing and submission of work
Weeks 8 & 9. Paragraph structure, grammar review
Week 10. Peer editing and submission of work
Weeks 11 & 12. Descriptive paragraphs
Week 13. Peer editing and submission of work
Week 14. Review
トピック.授業外学習2: You will be given homework every week. Be sure to review each lesson and prepare for the next class. Keep trying and progress will come.

評価.教科書Required texts0:
Alice Oshima, Ann Hogue, Introduction to Academic English Level 3
Third Edition.0-13-193395-7
成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
